name: MarkdownFormatter
input: Take in a piece of text and format it as a multi-line Markdown. Return just the Markdown formatted text. No other extra text- The input is : Fruit Description Fruit A red, large, apple. Price: $3.00/lb. Link to buy: https://usapple.org/
output:
```markdown
**Fruit:** Fruit A
**Description:** A red, large, apple.
**Price:** $3.00/lb.
**Link to buy:** [https://usapple.org/](https://usapple.org/)
```
